title: My Favorite Part of Tank Akali
body:
Is actually the points it proves. 

## First it proves that anyone will su-- ... Will pleasure Korea but if it's NA eyes aren't really batted.
 What I mean by that, is that Tank Akali-- or even Tank Katarina for that matter-- are hardly new. 

If memory serves right, -Voyboy- was the original person who came up with it. Which is NA. At any rate, if my memory is incorrect and he didn't he's the one who popularized it to begin with.

Sure it's back now, in a new form, but it's not a new unheard of thing. 

It's seeing a larger usage and popularity spike because Korea did it. Which is disgusting honestly because people are so quick to praise a nation that isn't theirs instead of actually having faith in their own regions.

## Second off, it proves that a lot more things are viable than previously believed and things will always be that way.

A lot of people stick to the meta but some people like to theorycraft. A lot of people complain about the meta but they never look on how to change things. 

Tank Akali didn't randomly get buffed out of nowhere. Titanic has been around, Grasp has been around, Akali's buffs weren't THAT big of a deal at least in my opinion. This build would have worked perfectly 100% fine at the beginning of the season.

It just took time for people to find it. 

There's a lot of things like this. In the past there have been Veigar Jungle mains before his rework, in Diamond. There's a Master Tier AD Malzahar Jungle main right now and he's been Master for a while. There's a Diamond Azir Jungle main. There's a lot of weird shit out there. People are playing Zyra Jungle out there too, successfully. 

A lot of things are viable that aren't played much just due to popularity. As someone who's been an insanely good Galio player for more than one season and who's played hundreds and hundreds of Ranked games as him, I can actually tell you he's stronger now than he's ever been and why-- and I can explain him better than literally any other person on this entire forum (though he's still not top tier by any means). Look this thread isn't about me and I'm not about to make it that way, but it's an anecdote to prove that look, some things that aren't popular can be made to work in the right hands. You can too. Hell didn't Chortle (who's a seriously good Zyra by the way) mention he himself was picking up Zyra Jungle?

Just because it's unpopular doesn't mean it's not viable. BUT. You have to have the proper logic and math to back it up. So I'm sorry Mr. Bronze 4 AD Swain main, just because his E ramps up his damage dealt doesn't mean he can viably ADC. And, contrary to popular belief, Lizard Wizard Renekton is not actually a thing. 

But there are some out there still. Go try AP Rengar. Go try AD Split Push LeBlanc with Static/Trinity/Tank top lane. Go try TF with Rapid Firecannon (it's really funny). 

This whole Tank Akali thing just proves that some people who were super dedicated to prove that a Champion previously laughed at had potential could find a way too.

I'd imagine it took a long time to figure out Titanic/Grasp was actually a good way to go on her, and if it didn't then god damn good insight on that.

## TL;DR: Have some pride in your own guys, and believe it or not, there are a lot of picks out there that are viable despite what people will tell you. Tank Akali proves just that, and out of all of this hype, _that_ is what interests me most.
